Class Merchant

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api.Merchant

  • public final class Merchant
extends java.lang.Object
    A threadsafe, immutable value object representing a Merchant.

    • Constructor Summary

      Merchant(int merchantId, java.lang.String apiToken)

      Create a new merchant with the provided ID, API token, and store ID.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Merchant

        public Merchant(int merchantId,
        java.lang.String apiToken)
        Create a new merchant with the provided ID, API token, and no store ID.
        Parameters:
        merchantId - The ID of the merchant issuing the requests.
        apiToken - The API token of the merchant issuing the requests.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If apiToken is null.

      • Merchant

        public Merchant(int merchantId,
        java.lang.String apiToken,
        java.lang.String storeId)
        Create a new merchant with the provided ID, API token, and store ID.
        Parameters:
        merchantId - The ID of the merchant issuing the requests.
        apiToken - The API token of the merchant issuing the requests.
        storeId - The merchant's store ID.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If apiToken is null.
